content: Nepotism in government is bad simply because it implies an unhealthy conflation of governmental power with family influence. Some cases may be good= pace the late Robert F.”Bobby” Kennedy(1925–68) as US Attorney General, but all in all it should be avoided- we don;t encourage in law enforcement, the armed forces or any other part of public life, so( except in banana republics or monarchies) we should keep it to a minimum!
